meanings.definition: To shape or mold something into a desired form.
meanings.sent1: She carefully yplasted the clay into a beautiful vase.
meanings.sent2: The sculptor yplasts the marble to create stunning statues.
meanings.sent3: The children yplasting playdough into funny shapes giggled happily.
meanings.sent4: Her words yplasted his heart into a million tiny pieces.
meanings.sent5: The artist yplasting colors on the canvas brought the painting to life.

meanings.definition: A substance used for shaping or molding.
meanings.sent1: The toy factory uses yplast to make colorful building blocks.
meanings.sent2: The chef added yplast to the recipe to give the dish a smooth texture.
meanings.sent3: The students had fun playing with yplast during art class.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like yplast, molding ideas into beautiful creations.
meanings.sent5: The sculptor's hands skillfully worked the yplast into intricate designs.
